test: Insightful text here, or something. I mean, what the heck should I say?
intro_to_game: Welcome to Clear Skies. 		 ----- You are ingroup ! -----
scripted_sequence_player_receives_hat: We gather here for a special occasion
scripted_sequence_player_receives_neckla: We gather here for a special occasion
scripted_sequence_players_birthday: We gather here for a special occasion
We wish you a Happy birthday!
scripted_sequence_npc_receives_necklace: We gather here for a special occasion
Our group member received a necklace!
scripted_sequence_passive_decide_tomato_: We gather here to decide what to sell at the market
This time you can't decide. Wait for the group to decide.
scripted_sequence_active_decide_tomato_o: We gather here to decide what to sell at the market

Everyone needs to vote one of the items:	 - tomato
							 - corn
scripted_sequence_buy_tomato: The group has decided to sell tomato!
scripted_sequence_buy_corn: The group has decided to sell corn!
label_not_available: check map tmx, Interactions layer, custom property: label
to_minigame_up: /\							 | |  go up to the Mini game
to_town: <= go left to the 'in group'					=> go right to the Forest					 | |							\/ go down to the Town
to_forest: => go right to the 'out group'					<= go left to the Town					 | |							\/ go down to the Forest
